summary:
This mod adds a new weapon called \"Imperial Law\", to the Abandoned Prison.
The weapon itself is an Iron Warhammer with crazy stats. No retexture or anything, just something
unique.
descriptionHtml:
Not only has the weapon been added, this mod adds a small little story of how the Hammer got there in the first place - it ties in with the story of the prison so it\'s all Lore-Friendly. There will
be a small journal on the ground next to the Hammer, as well as a potion, a helmet and a knapsack.
I always thought that this prison needed something special at the end, because it\'s a very unique
Dungeon in a scenic location. Something was missing, so that\'s why made this mod, to try and fill
the gap.


STATS


Base damage of 20, Absorb Health 15 points for 3 seconds - it has a small amount of charge because it\'s pretty OP.


INSTALLATION


Use the Nexus Mod Manager, because it\'s easy, ok?
author: PorkiousMaximus
